Career objective s& professional  interest s: 
A challenging position in a dynamic organization with potential for career advancement where I could utilize my 
experience, skills, Technical knowledge and thus contributing to the growth of the organization. To work in an 
organization where , I can fulfill  my dream, to give my best in my professional pursuit, where my knowledge and 
experience can be shared and enriched to become a successful mechanical engineer. Following  are some of my 
professional areas of interest ; 
 Research in Thermal science  
 Heat and Mass transfer, Thermodynamics, Energy Systems  
 Refrigeration and Air - Conditioning systems  – HVAC, multi component refrigeration systems  
 Design of Heat exchanger equipments by LMTD or NTU method.  
 Operation and maintenance of Boilers, Heat exchangers, HV AC units and other thermal equipments.
